snippet: The woman was held in the man’s apartment in Bedford-Stuyvesant, Brooklyn, and tortured, officials said.
abstract: Anthony Matthews is arrested and charged with attempted murder after police say he imprisoned a woman in his Bedford-Stuyvesant, Brooklyn apartment for more than a month and tortured her.
lead_paragraph: The woman was held in the man’s apartment in Bedford-Stuyvesant, Brooklyn, and tortured, officials said.

headline.seo: Woman Was Captive of Brooklyn Man for Month, Police Say
headline.main: Man Held Woman and Tortured Her, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Man Held Woman and Tortured Her, Police Say
